title: Rebuild and redeploy to recover from stopped backend canister (IC0508)

requirements.text: Trigger a rebuild and redeploy of the existing application (no functional changes required) to restart the backend canister that is currently stopped and causing replica rejection errors (IC0508) during startup.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build and deployment completes successfully.
After deployment, opening the app no longer fails with replica rejection IC0508 / "Canister ... is stopped" during startup initialization.
The app renders past the startup screen and shows the expected Sign In screen for unauthenticated users.

requirements.text: After redeploy, verify that the startup retry flow remains functional: when a connection error occurs, the 'Retry Connection' action must attempt actor initialization again and must not leave the UI stuck on a loading spinner indefinitely.

quotes: Cukup jawab: "ya, build ulang" dan saya akan langsung buat versi baru untuk menghidupkan kembali aplikasi kamu.

acceptanceCriteria: If actor initialization fails, the Startup Bootstrap Error screen is shown (not a blank screen).
Clicking 'Retry Connection' triggers a fresh initialization attempt and either recovers to normal app flow or re-shows an error screen with the latest error message.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit immutable frontend hook paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo if a state migration is required (not expected for a rebuild-only deploy).
nonGoals: No new product features or UI redesign beyond what is necessary to validate the rebuild/redeploy recovery.
No changes to data models, authorization rules, or invite/onboarding logic unless required to complete deployment.
